Class Chord

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • Chord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChordMessageInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Chord
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ChordMessageInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class creates a chord messenger node and implements the ChordMessageInterface class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
